Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Contains classes used to show the game to the client whatever interface is used (CLI or GUI)
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Ui
    This interface joins methods for User Interface regardless of chosen technology.
    ViewInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmmoTileView
    This class represent an AmmoTile on view side.
    AmmoTileViewTest  
    CliTest  
    ConcreteView
    This class represents the client-side view.
    MatchView
    This class represent an Match on view side.
    ModelView
    This class represent the entire Model on view side.
    PlayerView
    This class represent an Player on view side.
    PowerUpView
    This class represent an PowerUp on view side.
    SpawnSquareView
    This class represent an SpawnSquare on view side.
    SquareView
    This class represent an Square on view side.
    TurretSquareView
    This class represent an TurretSquare on view side.
    VirtualView
    This class represents the server-side view of a client.
    WeaponView
    This class represent an Weapon on view side.
